description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              This role is responsible for Month end, General ledger reconciliation, AP & AR functions at As White Vietnam for a client and their subsidiaries
              

              This position is responsible for the following areas:
              

              1.	Month end accounting
              
              - Month end accounting for The Client and their subsidiaries under instruction and review from Senior Financial Accountant
              
              - Intercompany transactions
              
              - Fixed Asset Register
              
              - Financial, Management reporting and analysis with group consolidation
              

              2.	GL reconciliations
              
              - GL reconciliations for all entities that are accounted for in Head office, Sydney (Client and their subsidiaries)
              
              - Responsible for the accuracy of all the ledgers for the above entities
              

              3.	Reporting
              
              - External Funder reporting
              
              - Funder payments
              
              - Collection report
              
              - Debtors in arrear report
              
              - Quarterly Sales Commission report
              

              4.	Supervision of assistant accountant for
              
              - Daily Bank drawings, allocation of receipts/ dishonours and bank reconciliation
              
              - SFL debenture payments
              
              - Daily bank drawings
              
              - AP / AR management
              
              - Weekly / fortnightly payment runs for Client and their subsidiaries
              

              5.	Process improvement
              
              - Identify and lead process improvement to reduce inefficiency / manual handling within the finance function
              

              6.	Ad hoc:
              

              - Other tasks requested by the Senior Financial Accountant, Financial Accounting Manager and CFO
              

              7.	Team cross skilling
              
              - Ensure the Vietnam team is cross-skilled so all members of the team can cover each other’s roles in absence.
              
              - Creation and maintenance of process notes, including reviewing staff members notes and preparing notes for areas under your control
              

              8.	Staff management
              
              - Create a best practice accounting function that challenges the status quo
              
              - Ensure all staff have a continuous improvement ethos where manual processes are automated
              
              - Mentor staff within the area and ensure they receive adequate training and coaching.
              
              - Create a fun and productive working environment
              

              9.	Personal commitment
              
              - Be part of a best practice accounting function that challenges the status quo
              
              - Bring to work a continuous improvement ethos where manual processes are automated
              
              - Play your part to ensure we have a fun and productive working environment.
              

              10.	Compliance
              
              - Abide by Anti-Money Laundering / Counter Terrorism Financing legislation / Privacy legislation / Insider Trading Laws / requirements of various financiers / any other policy updates from Head Office
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Relevant tertiary degree, preferably completed ACCA / CPA qualification;
              
              * Excellent English, especially, verbal communication, in addition to written communication;
              
              • Minimum 4-5 years' experience gained in professional services accounting environment.
              
              - Experienced in month-end accounting, and Reporting
              
              - Initiatives to improve processes
              
              - Strong written and verbal English communication skills
